snippet: The Yankees supported pitcher C. C. Sabathia after he announced on the eve of their wild-card appearance against the Houston Astros that he would enter an alcohol rehabilitation center.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column assesses way New York Yankees management and players have rallied to support pitcher C C Sabathia in his decision to skip rest of season to enter alcohol rehabilitation center; suggests Sabathia's honesty about problem is emblematic of accountability that has defined his career and made him so valuable to team.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees supported pitcher C. C. Sabathia after he announced on the eve of their wild-card appearance against the Houston Astros that he would enter an alcohol rehabilitation center.

headline.print_headline: Leader’s Abrupt Departure Brings Only Respect From Team
headline.main: Sabathia’s Abrupt Departure Brings Only Respect From Yankees
